title: Dental Infection Control Products Market to Reach $2.3 Billion by 2030 - Dentistry Today
summary: The global dental infection control products market is projected to reach $2.3 billion by 2030, driven by rising prevalence of oral diseases, growing awareness about oral healthcare, and the need to cut costs.
